group_1.textCenter: Since it's called the [textBlue:Rumor] of Chelation@Land...
I better make a theme park that fits the@[textBlue:Rumor]!
What kind of [textBlue:Rumor] was it, again?

group_1.textRight: I sort of remember...

group_1.narration: A stress-free theme park where you can@relax to your heart's content and be happy!
You won't wanna leave! No way! And you don't@have to! You can stay as long as you want!

group_1.textRight: Got it.
If it's just a place to relax, then maybe I@can leave it as is...
I wanna say, [chara:110300:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:110300:cheek_0][chara:110300:face_mtn_ex_040.exp.json][chara:110300:lipSynch_1]"Ah, but that's okay!"
But an amusement park with just one Ferris@wheel would be really boring, huh...

group_1.textLeft: Guests will want to go home right away.

group_1.textRight: That's the complete opposite of the [textBlue:Rumor].

group_1.textLeft: It's hard for me if I'm the only one spinning@around.

group_1.textRight: [chara:110300:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Oh, right!
Okay, I'll take this more seriously!
What's essential for an amusement park?
I knew you'd say that.
You're a carousel horse, after all. Or@wait...are you a lion?
Anyway, I'll make it so you can spin around@too, as much as you want!
What else... What about a roller coaster?
A roller coaster is your rival?
But...
All the big amusement parks have them.@I think we should have one, too.
You two need to get along, since you're the@two biggest attractions at the park.
Okay, what else. Shouldn't we have a@restaurant?

group_1.textLeft: We can't have guests trying to leave to go@eat lunch. *Clop*
We can't let any guests get away!

group_1.textRight: That's true. I did grow up in a restaurant.
I wanna put a fancy restaurant in the very@middle of the amusement park!
So, uh, how do I do that?

group_1.textLeft: The Magius cast a spell on this Uwasa making@it so energy can take any shape. *Clip*

group_1.textCenter: At the cost of a life. *Clop*

group_1.textRight: What? I don't get it.

group_1.textLeft: Basically, there's great magic at work here.
All you have to do is imagine what you want@to create.

group_1.textRight: Okay...
So I just have to think, "I want this!" and@that'll make it appear!
Oh?
Whoaaa!
Awesome! It's really here!

group_1.textLeft: Whir, whir, I told you so.

group_1.textRight: I get it now.
With this I can complete the amusement park!
